venue_description: HITS Post Time Farm in Ocala is one of the most spacious and horse‑friendly show grounds in the country. The 500‑acre property features bridle paths, lush grazing areas, ample riding and lunging space, permanent and temporary stabling options and on‑site housinghttps://jumpernation.com/hits-ocala-offers-plenty-of-new-stabling-and-on-site-housing-options-for-2021/#:~:text=Join%20HITS%20at%20Post%20Time,the%20horse%20and%20horseman%20first.

Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-ocala/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hoc-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Ocala (Post Time Farm) — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Big, spread-out, and built for mileage. HITS Ocala runs multiple rings at once, so plan your day by ring cluster and keep an eye on gate calls. Warm-up rings are generous but get stacked before the big eq and hunter divisions; grab a good oxer early and rotate with purpose. The jog strip is clearly marked—present tidy, legs cold, numbers visible, and move off with a crisp trot. Vendor row hugs the main action for quick fixes (spurs, gloves, hole punches) and last-minute braids. Stabling is shed-row style with wide aisles—fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags staged so you can hustle between trips. Footing is modern all-weather across the main rings with consistent maintenance and timely drags. Golf carts help, but smart route planning does more—group your schooling, then shuttle tack by cluster to save steps and minutes.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Ocala",
    "Post Time Farm",
    "A-circuit",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "ring flow",
    "Florida winter circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Dial in your HITS Ocala game plan",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-ocala/",
  "section_img_alt": "Grand Prix stadium and warm-up rings at HITS Ocala, Post Time Farm",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-ocala/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Ocala at Post Time Farm: warm-up strategy, jog strip logistics, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and time-saving tips for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Ocala — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, the jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing so you can move efficiently all week at HITS Ocala.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Ocala (Post Time Farm) Venue Profile — Ocala, FL",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Ocala: warm-up timing, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Ocala",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up windows: busiest 45 minutes pre-eq and jr/am hunters—set your last oxer right after a drag for clean tracks.",
      "Jog strip: keep a towel, rub rag, hoof oil, and alcohol spray at hand—numbers front-and-center and a crisp, forward trot.",
      "Ring calls: multiple rings run hot—sync to the in-gate text and plan by cluster (GP stadium vs. hunter complex).",
      "Footing feel: rides best once it’s packed—time a final vertical after a few trips for true read on ground.",
      "Stabling flow: wide shed rows—trunks flush, fans secured, aisles clear; stage ice boots and a ring bag by the door.",
      "Walk routes: use perimeter lanes around vendor row to avoid cart traffic at peak times.",
      "Schedule insurance: scratch/add early; gates move on time and will close between sections.",
      "Night sessions: check sightlines in the stadium at dusk—long approaches ride different under lights.",
      "Hydration & sun: mid-afternoon glare and heat—stash spare gloves, sunscreen, and a cool towel in your ring bag.",
      "Haul & park: plan a buffer on busy days; unload efficiently, then school by ring cluster to cut back-and-forth.",
      "Quick fixes: vendor row has braiding, spur straps, whips, and hole punches—hit it between drags, not at last call.",
      "Pro tip: pair ring runner + tack runner—one stays at stabling, one floats between warm-up and gate."
    ]
  }
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Post Time Farm","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-ocala/","city_uid":["rec4pE2d0qPNvDJhU"],"placeId":"EiUxMzcxMCBVUy0yNyAjMmMsIE9jYWxhLCBGTCAzNDQ4MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgn70QHZ14XoiBFzOLkSgsjA_hICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"13710 N Us Highway 27, Ocala, Fl 34482","venue_recordId":"recreCCqSZCvgnJG4"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Post Time Farm","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-ocala/","city_uid":["rec4pE2d0qPNvDJhU"],"placeId":"EiUxMzcxMCBVUy0yNyAjMmMsIE9jYWxhLCBGTCAzNDQ4MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgn70QHZ14XoiBFzOLkSgsjA_hICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"13710 N Us Highway 27, Ocala, Fl 34482","venue_recordId":"recreCCqSZCvgnJG4"}]), Post Time Farm represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 13710 N Us Highway 27, Ocala, Fl 34482, GEO context: lat=29.2921617, lon=-82.35421660000002 placeid=EiUxMzcxMCBVUy0yNyAjMmMsIE9jYWxhLCBGTCAzNDQ4MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgn70QHZ14XoiBFzOLkSgsjA_hICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Florida-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Post Time Farm in Ocala, FL is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: HITS Post Time Farm in Ocala is one of the most spacious and horseâ€‘friendly show grounds in the country. The 500â€‘acre property features bridle paths, lush grazing areas, ample riding and lunging space, permanent and temporary stabling options and onâ€‘site housinghttps://jumpernation.com/hits-ocala-offers-plenty-of-new-stabling-and-on-site-housing-options-for-2021/#:~:text=Join%20HITS%20at%20Post%20Time,the%20horse%20and%20horseman%20first.
